website_summaries.verdict: The Audio-Technica AH-CKX9iS Sonic Fuel earphones offer an extra-secure fit and pleasing audio balance with some added bass.
pros: Powerful audio performance with clean, solid bass response and well-defined highs
Very secure fit thanks to multiple ear tip options, including Comply foam tips
cons: Single button remote control can be annoying for track navigation and volume control

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, not such a great fit
customer_reviews.text: Upon listening to these earbuds more in depth and comparing them directly to all my other earbuds, I can say that they actually are alot clearer than the rest of the headphones I own. However, they are a bit to sybalant (don't know how to spell that) for my taste. They are very clear and high quality though, despite that. My only remaining con is their size. I know the large drivers provide their great sound but they're extremely hard to fit in my ears, and I know anyone with relatively average sized/small ears will have similar complaints.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect, definitely glad I ordered them
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect, definitely glad I ordered them! I needed a sturdy pair of earbuds to workout in that wouldn't fall out while running or doing whatever other activity I may be doing. I also needed earbuds that had excellent sound as I am an audiophile and didn't want the unnecessary bass of the beats by dre's but I needed clarity as well and these did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Iyobosa

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in March 2018, and it was really amazing at the time. It was the only earbuds that I tried with actual bass. I usually put these in my pockets or shoved in my backpack, which I didnt find as a problem. But in July, the wire broke from the bottom of the volume adjuster. I taped it up, but now only one side of the earbud is working. My recomendation: buy earbuds with braided wires for better durability. They m sa y tangle a little bit more, but that's a price I'm willing to pay to keep both my earbuds working. Plus, their pretty big too.
customer_reviews.author: Uma Temal

customer_reviews.title: Poor build, A+ sound
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why this isn’t one star is because while I used these earbuds, the sound was utterly amazing and the best I’ve ever heard from earbuds. I bought these a little under a month ago and the left side has already crapped out. I thought I found the perfect pair, but in reality these earbuds break easily. A true least from my experience...
customer_reviews.author: Jay Goldman

customer_reviews.title: -C-tips tear easily. I partially tore one of the c-tips during ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Good enough sound for in-ear headphones. -Stay firmly in ears -Good isolation with the 3rd party earbuds Cons: -C-tips tear easily. I partially tore one of the c-tips during installation and have no idea where to get replacement from, in my country. -Analog volume slider. Did AT wanted to support more devices that way? It is easily caught up in clothing, modifying the volume. Also it is prone to dust contamination, and in general attenuates the audio signal even when at max setting. Obsolete technology.
customer_reviews.author: fire

customer_reviews.title: just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: i have a pair of over the ear headphones by DNA monster and they sound excellent but there very heavy and hard to lug around, so i needed a lighter pair of in ears for everyday listening and came across these, in my opinion these have a great sound I've heard beats in ear's apple ear pods dna monsters etc: for me the AUDIO TECHNICA's are the best I've heard so far, there very comfortable light weight the flat wire is wonderful not having to deal with tangles and the sound is great these are definitely not replacements for my DJ'ing over the ears but for everyday listening i would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Personal opinion
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is good. The sound quality is superior. The delivery was within the schedule and the packaging was in good condition. The only bad thing about the earphone is its size. Its kinda huge. But it makes up its huge size by the sound quality. Its awsome.
customer_reviews.author: FAHIM HASAN

customer_reviews.title: these Audio Technica earphones are great in terms of sound quality
customer_reviews.text: As expected, these Audio Technica earphones are great in terms of sound quality. The fit is good and snug, making it so I hear even less noise than with other earphones I've used when commuting to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. The microphone quality unfortunately not good
customer_reviews.author: Halid Kalkan

customer_reviews.title: They are excellent in both construction and sound
customer_reviews.text: They are excellent in both construction and sound. The downside is that the phones are great and after a while it can become unapproachable to the ears; the microphone is slightly below normal, getting too far from the mouth and can cause difficulties in call communication.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Love the slide volume control
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Love the slide volume control, comes with a nice case, and a wide variety of plug options. Sound is good too but fit isn't quite as snug as the Bose and there is no clip to clip to your shirt while running
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Get these ..by all means.
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT. Big can sound in buds..unreal! Durable..beautiful full deep bass..maximum sound quality with Music Volume EQ app on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Hair88

customer_reviews.title: These are the best sounding earbuds on this price range
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sounding earbuds on this price range, or any price range for that matter. Would like to be able to hear myself in them when I'm on the phone though.
customer_reviews.author: benvoice

customer_reviews.title: Clean and heavy bass
customer_reviews.text: The sound is clean and clear but don't mistake that for no bass. It's present. Rami Bizzle x The North Virus - Old School Convertible sounds sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Billiam Levy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality as expected but kind of uncomfortable to wear for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: jai

customer_reviews.title: Works great and isolates outside noises very well
customer_reviews.text: Works great and isolates outside noises very well. The volume control knob works great, only disappointed that it doesn't mute when turned all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was phenomenal for the entire two weeks the unit lasted. These earbuds simply stopped working. Be warned
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound on these
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound on these. They play plenty loud and stay secure in my ears. In addition, I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of phone calls using these.
customer_reviews.author: James p

customer_reviews.title: Audio Technica Sonic
customer_reviews.text: They stop working after 6 months.I am not happy after all that money you spend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent overall sound quality with truly impressive bass. Plays with great fidelity at all volumes. The larger earbuds actually fit snugly, and securely due to the design of the c-tips.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Edwin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are definitely designed for an active every day lifestyle. The C-tip stabilizers do wonders to hold the 9iS in your ears. The quality of the cable & the shielding are really impressive. These headphones can definitely withstand an abuse while moving around. The 3.5mm headphone connector is gold-plated and has a 90 degree L-shaped plug, which is a huge bonus. The one thing i would have liked is a shirt clip. I am not sure why there aren't many reviews for this product. This one is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Hemanth H Iyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, great reproduction of Bass
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, great reproduction of Bass, confortable in ear for hours. The volume regulation could be better. Four deserved Stars
customer_reviews.author: G. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great at noise cancellation and providing crisp and clear sound.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa leggett

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, sits firmly in the ears although not the most comfortable. Lack of shirt clip is adding to the discomfort (can't understand why it is not included).
customer_reviews.author: Dror

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound - decent bass. Almost on a par with the Bose set that I paid about $120.00 for. Definitely recommended.......
customer_reviews.author: Greg T.

customer_reviews.title: Sound is amazing but my right ear buds keep falling out
customer_reviews.text: Sound is amazing but my right ear buds keep falling out. These are not really good your eats sweats. At home they are nice but they never seem to just fit and I had these for 5 months now. Again, sound is amazing but the ear gel bud on right side for not for me well. I would buy again because I normally break ear buds after a month or two or they stop working so grab a pair because they are very durable
customer_reviews.author: Ytwizz

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for running and weight lifting, and have never had them come lose in my ears. Great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product got here on time the sound is very nice earphone stay in place as they're supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but lack basic durability
customer_reviews.text: These aren't durable enough for normal athletic use (I just wear while running/off-road biking). I am not really hard on earbuds (my main sonys have been going strong for 5 years). That said, after just 3 weeks the left channel was starting to go in and out every once in a while. This week (2 days after return window expired), the mic has stopped working consistently. I like the way they fit and sound, but they are just too fragile. Hopefully the design will be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Haskell Westrope

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these head phones and the quality of sound it ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these head phones and the quality of sound it provides. Unfortunately after having it for almost a month now the right side head phone is starting to give up.
customer_reviews.author: Yaj

customer_reviews.title: These headphones were great for the first month until one of the buds ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were great for the first month until one of the buds stopped working completely. Guess they couldn't handle sweat and or gym activity. Wasted $70 on a pair of buds that didn't even last a month. Unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: Will E.

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding but...
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding earbuds the only problem is that within a week of having them the part that goes in your ear pulled out of the metal casing on the right ear bud. Not a huge deal it can easily be put back in but just annoying since it can come out so easily in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: alex klimkoski

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones with 1 drawback
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. Keeping in mind that this is not designed for noise cancellation, it fulfills all in-ear headphone functionality and then some! It stays in place, and the chords don't get tangled. They give you several buds and arches to adjust the headphones to your ear's requirements. The finish is nice and sleek. That being said I have an issue with the microphone. I bought this with the additional price so i can talk on the phone with the headphones but for some reason they designed it ridiculously far from your face such that you have to hold it up to your face. At least with the Apple headphones the microphone are at a reasonable distance.
customer_reviews.author: Pyro

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as their 'real' headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these - as a big fan of the ATH-M50X I thought these might be a good portable option. The earpieces are secure, but not comfortable ( I tried with the stock and also the comply isolation set) but they just don't seem to fit right. The construction feels cheap and plastic - again not up to the standard of the over-the-ear cans, and the microphone just sits too low to be useful on the cord. The analog volume slider is an oddity these days, so I'll be returning them in an effort to find something a but more sturdy for travel. Nice looking set of earbuds, OK sound, but low marks for quality and implementation.
customer_reviews.author: Dickie

customer_reviews.title: good sound, poor comfort
customer_reviews.text: these are less comfortable than the bose quite comfort. I cannot keep them in my ear for more than 30 minutes at a time
customer_reviews.author: James Michael Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: imposible to win at this price
customer_reviews.text: Very clean, flat, complete sound. Excelent case. Several ear tips to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Dario

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great. Great value for its price but the ear ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great. Great value for its price but the ear buds are too large. I used the smallest size ear tips but still they are uncomfortable. Hence the three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ananth Narayan Samudrala

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!....Until it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is everything you would expect from a 100 dollar set of buds. They fit well and stay in during most of my workout,but my old senneiser sport buds were better. The little volume adjuster is terrible and completely ruins an otherwise good product. My first set arrived with a broken adjuster that caused one or both speakers to go out. Now my replacement set has the same problem after 3.5 months of use. They clearly have some issues with the adjuster. I believe there is a model of these without that adjuster, I would strongly advise getting those and save yourself a couple bucks and a hadache or two.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Watson

customer_reviews.title: Although the sound quality was great. It took about a week for my ears ...
customer_reviews.text: Headphones go thanked out of my ear and broke about a month after purchasing them. Although the sound quality was great. It took about a week for my ears to adjust to the borderline painful design of these as it felt like it stretched part of my ear to fit. Because I am a fan of high quality music I have these 3 stars - because they are good headphones nevertheless.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good but they're a bit uncomfortable. Too big I think.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Most disappointing ear buds I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Was most disappointing pair of ear buds I have ever worn. Looked at reviews here and online and was excited to be getting a huge bang for my buck. Nope. Quality of sound is worse than a generic pair of Apple ear phones, no joke. Sound was not balanced at all and vocals were an after thought. They fit a bit weird in the ears too, and they're very bulky. I would avoid buying these; there are definitely better ear buds out there for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but in the winter the cord gets ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound , but in the winter the cord gets hard and stiff , and cause the ear phones to fall from the ear
customer_reviews.author: Foste

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Poor cost-benefit ratio. Sound was quite a bit inferior to my other in-ear phones, which were only slightly more expensive. Internal wires broke after only two months of use, but just past the one-month return window. I regret having bought it.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Great product, best in ear headphones I've gotten so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, best in ear headphones I've gotten so far. If you're looking to buy some good headphones these are probably the ones you should buy.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: I expected more. Do these actually fit in anyone's ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected more. Do these actually fit in anyone's ears? These were just so far off the mark for me that they didn't even go in all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Frank

customer_reviews.title: the sound is poor and has too much treble
customer_reviews.text: With rubber tips, the sound is poor and has too much treble. Tried with different Equaliser settings but could not get them sounding any better. With enclosed Comply foam tips the sound is super. I don't like the volume changer, it does not alter my iPhone's volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good but not worth the pain
customer_reviews.text: They are too heavy and constantly fall of your ear. The sound is good but not worth the pain.
customer_reviews.author: pawandeep singh

customer_reviews.title: Sounds is very good, fits ear nicely and tight
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sounds is very good, fits ear nicely and tight. Cons: when walking/running, the juncture between the wire and the earphone makes a ticking noise that is very annoying. I find this defective design quite serious, since it can ruin the whole listening experience.
customer_reviews.author: richal

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THEM
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 1 month, after that 50% of my right ear headphone volume went missing. Had to use my phone settings to fix it and now the sound quality is really bad DO NOT BUY THEN
customer_reviews.author: yair

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but not durable
customer_reviews.text: The sound it's good but after 7 months the left earbud started to sound very low.
customer_reviews.author: lupstor

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Two pairs have broke already! Not worth the money! DONT BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.author: LuzAna

customer_reviews.title: Blood amazing. Stay in my ears
customer_reviews.text: Blood amazing. Stay in my ears....which can't keep anything in. Perfect bass and pretty good treble. Good international delivery . Edit: broke without reason in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot

product_meta.title: Audio-Technica ATH-CKX9iS SonicFuel In-Ear Headphones with In-Line Mic & Control
product_meta.description: Music is your energy for life - the fuel for your heart and soul. SonicFuel headphones are specifically designed for active, daily use, to power you forward by delivering extraordinary comfort, style and an immersive listening experience that never sounds artificial, processed or filtered. Just pure sonic goodness for the high-octane tempo of your life. The ATH-CKX9iS SonicFuel in-ear headphones feature stay-in-place fit, providing unique comfort in addition to optimal sound. The C-tip configuration nestles within the ear where it locks in place for extra stability. Customize your comfort with a multitude of C-tip and silicone ear tip sizes or use the included Comply foam ear tips for true sonic immersion. Large 13.5 mm performance-enhanced drivers fuel your day with a premium listening experience, deeper bass response and sparkling high frequencies.
feature_bullets: Large 13.5 mm performance enhanced drivers offer a premium listening experience
C-tip design fits the shape of your ear for reliable stay-in-place comfort
In- line control with Mic for answering/ending calls, controlling music & video playback, and controlling volume (on compatible smartphones & other portable devices)
Included luxury zippered hard carrying keeps headphones protected and easy to find every time
Also includes Comply foam tips, silicone ear tips (XS/S/M/L), C-tips (S/M/L), and tangle-free flat cable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars299 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
